job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: ltpgta houston based consultancy are looking to add a data scientist to their experience team the consultancy are focused towards aidata science and work closely with a range of clients across industriesltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtltstronggtresponsibilitiesltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtanalyze raw data assessing quality cleansing structuring for downstream processingltligtltligtdesign accurate and scalable prediction algorithmsltligtltligtcollaborate with engineering team to bring analytical prototypes to productionltligtltligtgenerate actionable insights for business improvementsltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtqualificationsltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtbachelors degree or equivalent experience in quantative field statistics mathematics computer science engineering etcltligtltligtat least years of experience in quantitative analytics or data modelingltligtltligtdeep understanding of predictive modeling machinelearning clustering and classification techniques and algorithmsltligtltligtfluency in a programming language python cc java sqlltligtltligtfamiliarity with big data frameworks and visualization tools cassandra hadoop spark tableaultligtltulgt
